Attributes.Name: Operating Temprature
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'What temp the laser operates at'

Attributes.Name: Input Light
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Energy out put of a laser pulse'

Attributes.Name: Chamber Absorption
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'What percentage of stored light in the chamber is lost as heat (tech)'

Attributes.Name: Conversion Efficency
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'What percentage of input energy gets converted into light (tech)'

Attributes.Name: Lense Emission
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'What percentage of stored light is fired (tech)'

Attributes.Name: Pulse Energy
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Energy output of a laser pulse'
Attributes.AttributeFormula: Ability('Lense Emission') * (Ability('Input Light') - Ability('Input Light') * Exp(Ability('Chamber Absorption') * -1 * Ability('Charge Period'))) / Ability('Chamber Absorption')

Attributes.Name: Thermal Output
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Waste Thermal heat output by laser'
Attributes.AttributeFormula: (Ability('Power Input') * Ability('Charge Period') - Ability('Pulse Energy')) / Ability('Charge Period')

Attributes.Name: Beam waist
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Width of beam at focal length (debug)'
Attributes.AttributeFormula: Ability('Operating Temprature') * Ability('Operating Temprature') * Ability('Focal Length') * 0.000000001 * Ability('Target Wavelength') * ( 1 / Ability('Lens Diameter') )
